Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.view

Class SimuViewControl

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.view.SimuViewControl
public class SimuViewControl extends Object
Controller class for managing the simulation view of the hospital simulation application.

  • Method Details

    • backButtonAction

      public void backButtonAction(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the action for the back button. Stops all threads, resets values, and loads the main menu.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouse event

    • initializeSimulation

      public void initializeSimulation(int registerCount, int generalCount, int specialistCount, MainMenuViewControl menuView, ResultViewControl resultView)
      Initializes the simulation with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      registerCount - the number of register service points
      generalCount - the number of general service points
      specialistCount - the number of specialist service points
      menuView - the main menu view control
      resultView - the result view control

    • setCloseEventListener

      public void setCloseEventListener(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the close event listener for the stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      Gets the current stage of the simulation view.
      Returns:
      the current stage

    • displayClock

      public void displayClock(double time)
      Updates the time label with the given time in minutes.
      Parameters:
      time - the time to display in minutes

    • displayBEvent

      public void displayBEvent(Customer customer, ServiceUnit su)
      Displays the view of event of a customer moving to a service unit or exiting. Updates the customer's position and animates the movement.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer involved in the event
      su - the service unit the customer is moving to, or null if exiting

    • isCustomerExist

      public boolean isCustomerExist(int customerid)
      Checks if a customer with the given ID exists in the customer view list.
      Parameters:
      customerid - the ID of the customer to check
      Returns:
      true if the customer exists, false otherwise

    • getCustomerInfo

      public CustomerView getCustomerInfo(int cusomterId)
      Retrieves the customer information for the given customer ID. If the customer does not exist, creates a new customer and adds it to the customer view list.
      Parameters:
      cusomterId - the ID of the customer
      Returns:
      the CustomerView object for the given customer ID

    • getSerViceUnitName

      public static String getSerViceUnitName(int serviceUnitNumber)
      Returns the name of the service unit based on the given service unit number.
      Parameters:
      serviceUnitNumber - the number of the service unit
      Returns:
      the name of the service unit, or null if the number is not recognized

    • displayCEvent

      public void displayCEvent(Customer curstomer, ServicePoint sp)
      Displays the view of a event of a customer moving to a service point. Updates the customer's position and animates the movement.
      Parameters:
      curstomer - the customer involved in the event
      sp - the service point the customer is moving to
